author: hossman
msg: SOLR-1240: merging Range Faceting changes from trunk.  this not only included r980555 and r980592 but because there has been a lot of refactoring to the way SimpleFacetsTest works on trunk, i just merged all of r926572:980555 for that single file

author: kmalhi
msg: Patch from Mark Eschbach which fixes issue OPENEJB-1313.
Thanks Mark, and appreciate the documentation.

author: eckardjf
msg: Index product keywords when a GoodIdentification is created or updated

author: eckardjf
msg: Only pass the Product value to indexProductKeywords for a create operation - the value passed for a store operation is not guaranteed to contain all fields used for indexing. If index.delete.on_index=true then this scenario could cause a partial re-index / loss of keywords.
